hooks.command: FILE=$(jq -r '.tool_input.file_path' < /dev/stdin); if [[ "$FILE" == *.rs ]]; then export PATH="$HOME/.cargo/bin:$PATH" && cargo fmt --quiet 2>/dev/null || true; fi
FILE=$(jq -r '.tool_input.file_path' < /dev/stdin); if [[ "$FILE" == *Cargo.lock ]] || [[ "$FILE" == */target/* ]]; then echo 'Do not edit Cargo.lock or target/ files' >&2; exit 2; fi
